protection_level_standard_description.message: Blocks most trackers and cookies efficiently.

protection_level_strict_description.message: Blocks all trackers and cookies, may affect some sites.

protection_level_disabled_description.message: The browsing protection is disabled, Qwant remains your default search engine.

popup_main_problem_disable_protection.message: A problem on this site ? Try to deactivate.

popup_settings_telemetry_label.message: Help Qwant improve the extension by sending anonymous error reports and usage statistics

missing_permissions_default_search_engin.message: Qwant is your default search engine
Every query you put in the address bar goes to Qwant.

missing_permissions_disabled_description.message: Your data remains confidential when your search on Qwant, but the trackers and cookies blocking is not activated.

onboarding_step_request_permissions_desc.message: Qwant VIPrivacy blocks trackers and refuses cookies for you. Your personal data is protected on all sites when you browse. Click "Authorize" to enable the protection. If you ignore this step, Qwant VIPrivacy will not be installed.

onboarding_step_protection_level_descrip.message: You can change your choice at any time by clicking on the Qwant VIPrivacy icon.

onboarding_step_pin_extension_title.message: Pin Qwant VIPrivacy on %browser% and follow your statistics in real time

onboarding_step_telemetry_description.message: Share your feedback anonymously to help us improve your protection.

onboarding_step_permissions_rejected_tit.message: Thank you, Qwant is your default search engine but…

onboarding_step_permissions_rejected_sub.message: Beware you are not completely protected.

onboarding_step_thank_you_title.message: Thank you for installing Qwant VIPrivacy

blocking_pages_rule_content_description.message: %name% prevented this page from loading because it was flagged as a tracking resource.
